title: First
helptext: Of course, not all these texts were originally written in English

title: Second
helptext: These are short, famous texts in English from classic sources like the Bible or Shakespeare.

title: Third
helptext: Some texts have word definitions and explanations to help you.

title: Four
helptext: Try to understand them, because the English that we speak today is based on what our great, great, great, great grandparents spoke before!
